hey-there: Hey there! Online and mobile app check-in is available 24 hours and up to 1 hour before
flight departure. Buy your Bags and Seats anytime prior to 1 hour before flight departure

options-summary-component.flight-flex-descriptions: Modify your itinerary once for free, up to 24 hours before departure
options-summary-component.shortcut-security-description: Skip the line and get access to a dedicated security lane at the airport
options-summary-component.shortcut-boarding-description: Zone 2 priority boarding and early access to the overhead bins
